common.something_went_wrong: Wani abu ya yi phaya. Da fatan samun saba.

auth.privacy_agree: Na fahimci cewa bayanan na za a yi aiki don aiwatar da wannan sallautawa
auth.password_mismatch: Kalmomin sirri ba su dace ba
auth.login_failed: Shigowa kusan ta kasa. Da fatan samun saba.
auth.register_failed: Jirjirawa ta kasa. Da fatan samun saba.

dashboard.title: Pankin gasku
dashboard.until_next_expires: Har sallautawa na gida ya ƙare
dashboard.warning_excluded: Kana da jiyya-sallautawa aiki a jiya. An sallautaka daga duk ƴan wasun da aka bayarwa izini a lokacin nan.
dashboard.cannot_register: Ba zai yiwu jirjirawa sabuwa yayin aiki ba
dashboard.important_notice: Mahimmanci: Fadeyi sallautawaka za a ƙara lokacin da aka zaba zuwa ranar ƙarshen sallautawaka na jiya.

self_exclude.title: Jirjirtawa don jiyya-sallautawa
self_exclude.subtitle: Ɗauki iko na wasunka
self_exclude.description: Jiyya-sallautawa kayan aiki ne da malintashi don taimaka maka bari wasa. Lokacin da ka jirjita da NSER, masu wasun da suka shiga dole ne ka hanawa daga abin misalinka.
self_exclude.error_message: Jirjirawa kusan kasa. Da fatan samun saba.
self_exclude.confirmation_text: Kina gaba da jirjirtawa don jiyya-sallautawa. Wannan aiki ya karamu da shari'a.

assessment.title: Kimantawar hadari
assessment.subtitle: Ɗauka jarbamar hadarin wasa
assessment.description: Wannan kimantawa tana taimaka mana fahimtar yadda wakaken wasunka da matakan hadari.
assessment.page_subtitle: Kimanta yadda kaka ne wasan ka
assessment.low_risk_interpretation: Kimantawaka ta nuni hade da yadda kaka ne wasan kai da hadari mai ƙaifi. Ci gaba da al'ada mababbaba da lura da aikinku.
assessment.medium_risk_interpretation: Kimantawaka ta nuni hade da yadda kaka ne wasan kai na tsakani. Yi tunanin saitawa da duba al'adunka a jiya.
assessment.high_risk_interpretation: Kimantawaka ta nuni hade da yadda kaka ne wasan kai da hadari mai girma. An shawarata taimako na likitanci.
assessment.severe_risk_interpretation: Kimantawaka ta nuni hade da yadda kaka ne wasan kai na hamartattaka. An kara shawarata taimako na likitanci jiya.
assessment.next_step_1: Sake duba yadda kaka ne wasunka da saita iyakoki
assessment.next_step_2: Yi tunanin magana da jami'i ko mai masu aiki
assessment.next_step_3: Sake ɗauki kimantawa cikin kwanaki 30 don bita ci gaba

help.title: Taimako da goyan baya
help.subtitle: Samun taimako da albarkatun
help.email_description: Aika imel zuwa jin taimako namu
help.what_is_self_exclusion_answer: Jiyya-sallautawa kayan aiki ne da ba ka bukatar wajaba da lokaci na zaɓin ka hanawa daga duk masu wasun da aka bayarwa izini. A wannan lokacin, masu wasun dole ne da sharƙokin ya ƌauke ka daga abin misalinka.
help.can_cancel_early: Ina zai iya soke jiyya-sallautawa nafa?
help.can_cancel_early_answer: A'a, jiyya-sallautawa mai karamu kuma ba za a iya soke ta lokacin sallautawa ba. Haka ya daceyi ne domin karɓar ka. A saman gaske kawai na iya tunkarar karɓarwa jiya - tuntubar taimako don ƙarin bayanai.
help.will_carry_over: Za a ɗauke sallautawa naka tsakanin masu wasun?
help.will_carry_over_answer: I! Jiyya-sallautawaka ta jirjita a cikin jifiir ƙarƙashin kasa kuma duk masu wasun da aka bayarwa izini dole ne su duba jifiir na nan lokacin da kaka gaba da samun abibin misalinka.
help.update_profile: Yadda na sake asali naf asalin?
help.update_profile_answer: Kana iya sake asali naf asalin ta je wa saita akaunti a gida naf pankin. Kana iya bada saita bayanan jituwa, saukacin da sauran bayanan akaunti.
help.verify_identity_answer: Kana iya gama tabbatawen asalin ta hanyar saita akaunti. Aika karamin kyakkyawar asali da jajiya ke bayarwa kuma za mu tabbatarwa a cikin asar 24-48.
help.enable_2fa: Yadda na buga ainihin gida biyu?
help.enable_2fa_answer: Je wa saita tsaro kuma buga 2FA. Za ka karɓa lambobi ta SMS ko ƙarin aiki ne na tabbatawa domin tsaro na gida.
help.account_compromised: Menene ni jin in akaunti naka aka zalumci?
help.account_compromised_answer: Badillin kalmar sirri ta gaggawa kuma buga 2FA in ba a buga ba jiya. In ka yi tunanin zuwa a da izini, tuntubar taimako jiya da bayanai na akaunti naka.
help.available_assessments_answer: Muna bayar da kimantawa uku masu ila da hujja: LIEBET (nisan gaggawa), PGSI (cikakke), da DSM-5 (ƙididdige likitanci). Waɗannan suna taimaka kimanta matakan hadari na wasunka.

notifications.title: Sanarwa
notifications.receive_updates_email: Karɓa sabuntawa da gargajiya ta imel
notifications.get_reminders: Karɓa tunatawa game da matsayin sallautawa naka

security.title: Saita tsaro
security.2fa_extra_security: Akaunti naka tana da waje na tsaro
security.add_extra_security: Ƙara waje na tsaro ta bukatinta lambar tabbatawa a aika zuwa wayar naka lokacin shigowar.
security.verification_code_sent: Lambar tabbatawa ta jiyya 6 an aika zuwa {phone}
security.invalid_code: Lambar tabbatawa ba ta dace ba

settings_page.title: Saita
settings_page.subtitle: Gudnar da akaunti da saukacin naka
settings_page.revoke_device_confirm: Ka tabbata kana bukata soke shigar akan wannan ke?
settings_page.logout_other_confirm: Ka tabbata kana bukata fita tun sauran kayan ganowa?

modal.this_cannot_be_undone: Ba za a iya sake aiki wannan ba.

errors.invalid_phone: Da fatan shiga nombar waya mai dace
errors.passwords_dont_match: Kalmomin sirri ba su dace ba
errors.something_went_wrong: Wani abu ya yi phaya. Da fatan samun saba.
errors.network_error: Kosa sadarwa. Da fatan dubanta jituwa naka.
errors.unauthorized: Ba ka da izinin aiwatar da wannan aiki.
errors.not_found: Albarkatun da ake bukata ba a tarar ba.
errors.password_required: Da fatan cika duk fannin kalmar sirri
errors.min_password_length: Kalmar sirri dole ne ta samu jirga ta aƙalla 8

success.profile_updated: An sake asali asalin cikin nasara
success.password_changed: An badillin kalmar sirri cikin nasara
